snippets.title: Protein target per meal
snippets.text: A simple target is ~20–30g protein per main meal.

snippets.title: Protein rubric
snippets.text: High: names sources and amounts per meal. Moderate: vague sources. Low: no awareness.

snippets.title: Progressive overload tip
snippets.text: If you hit all reps with good form, add 2.5kg or 1–2 reps next week.

snippets.title: Reflection rubric
snippets.text: High: weekly written review with 1–2 changes applied next week; Moderate: ad-hoc; Low: none.
